com.github.triceo.splitlog.api

Interface ExceptionDescriptor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultExceptionDescriptor

    public interface ExceptionDescriptor
    Describes an exception instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExceptionDescriptor getCause()
      Returns the cause for this exception.
      Class<? extends Throwable> getExceptionClass()
      Best-effort attempt to provide an exception type for getExceptionClassName().
      String getExceptionClassName() 
      String getMessage() 
      List<StackTraceElement> getStackTrace()
      This method will create a brand new unmodifiable list every time it is called.
      boolean isRootCause() 

    • Method Detail

      • getCause

        ExceptionDescriptor getCause()
        Returns the cause for this exception.
        Returns:
        Exception data if isRootCause() returns true, null otherwise.

      • getExceptionClass

        Class<? extends Throwable> getExceptionClass()
        Best-effort attempt to provide an exception type for getExceptionClassName().
        Returns:
        Exception type if found on classpath, null otherwise.

      • getExceptionClassName

        String getExceptionClassName()

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()

      • getStackTrace

        List<StackTraceElement> getStackTrace()
        This method will create a brand new unmodifiable list every time it is called. Use with caution.
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable representation of the stack trace.

      • isRootCause

        boolean isRootCause()
